title: Analyzing Reward Dynamics and Decentralization in Ethereum 2.0: An Advanced Data Engineering Workflow and Comprehensive Datasets for Proof-of-Stake Incentives
abstract: arXiv:2402.11170v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Ethereum 2.0, as the preeminent smart contract blockchain platform, guarantees the precise execution of applications without third-party intervention. At its core, this system leverages the Proof-of-Stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which utilizes a stochastic process to select validators for block proposal and validation, consequently rewarding them for their contributions. However, the implementation of blockchain technology often diverges from its central tenet of decentralized consensus, presenting significant analytical challenges. Our study collects consensus reward data from the Ethereum Beacon chain and conducts a comprehensive analysis of reward distribution and evolution, categorizing them into attestation, proposer and sync committee rewards. To evaluate the degree of decentralization in PoS Ethereum, we apply several inequality indices, including the Shannon entropy, the Gini Index, the Nakamoto Coefficient, and the Herfindahl

translated_title: 分析以太坊2.0中奖励动态和去中心化: 一种高级数据工程工作流和全面数据集，用于权益证明激励
translated_abstract: 作为卓越的智能合约区块链平台，以太坊2.0保证了应用的精确执行，无需第三方干预。本系统的核心是利用权益证明（PoS）共识机制，利用随机过程选择验证人员进行区块提议和验证，随后奖励他们的贡献。然而，区块链技术的实现经常偏离了去中心化共识的核心原则，带来了重大的分析挑战。我们的研究收集了以太坊Beacon链的共识奖励数据，并对奖励分配和演变进行了全面分析，将其分类为证明、提议者和同步委员会奖励。为评估以太坊权益证明中的去中心化程度，我们应用了几种不平等指数，包括香农熵、基尼系数、中本聪系数和赫芬达尔指数。
tldr: 分析了以太坊2.0中奖励的动态和去中心化程度，提出了一种高级数据工程工作流和全面数据集，有助于更好地理解权益证明激励的奖励分配和演变。
en_tdlr: Analyzed reward dynamics and decentralization in Ethereum 2.0, proposed an advanced data engineering workflow and comprehensive datasets to better understand reward distribution and evolution in Proof-of-Stake incentives.
